"Editing your ARKS Card!":
"ARKS these days are lazy!
They don't understand how important
it is to properly identify yourself.
A good ARKS Card is like an introduction.
Make sure you set it up in advance.
For other ARKS, it's like speaking a
thousand words.
Your whole party will be able to
view it.
I like to put hobbies on my ARKS Card..."
"Save any text on your ARKS Card"
